title: Letters to Malcolm: Chiefly on Prayer
description: In the form of warm, relaxed letters to a close friend, Lewis meditates on many puzzling questions concerning the intimate dialogue between man and God. Lewis also considers practical and metaphysical aspects of private prayer, petitionary prayer, the Lord’s Prayer, and other forms of prayer.“A beautifully executed and deeply moving book” (Saturday Review).
author: C.S. Lewis
